Reviews.Title: Great Price Fair Quality
Reviews.Author: Suncoasting
Reviews.Content: I dont know about that 1 star review, but you do get what you pay for. I've had these Zmodo Systems in the past and have had my current one for 2 years. You will sit on hold for service, no doubt.  They are good for warranty replacement. I had my HD crash about 10 months into it and I got a new one no problem. Well, not exactly no problem but they took care of it.  I've also had to switch out 2 cameras because the IR lights seem to like to go out. Not all of them, but a few going out on a camera can significantly reduce your night vision. For the money I can't really complain. You know, Chinese product. Being able to see my house and move my cameras from my Android phone and IPad is cool! And I have it set up for email alerts to my phone when I'm away. If there is motion on a camera it will take a snap shot and email it to you.... Then you can open the app on your mobile device and hop on live to see what's going on back at the place. You will want to set up a separate email account for this, and turn the camera sensitivity down to about a 2-3 for outside, or else you will get a lot of  notifications. All in all, three stars, and I'd say I'm happy with it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Bad customer support, replacement for defective IP camera is an old defective camera
Reviews.Author: cuticuteo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system in hope that Zmodo stands for what it says on its website. I spent over $500 for this system. Three out of four camera is working fine. The 4th one kept falling off the network and needed power on/off several times a day. I complained to Zmodo and they told me they would gladly send me a replacement.After spending another $12 to ship the defective camera back, I waited for more than a week to receive the replacement IP camera. Surprise, it's an old, scratched up camera and what more, this one doesn't work either.Don't spend money buying Zmodo product. You get what you pay for: cheap system means defective parts and poor customer service.http://www.zmododirect.com/zmodo-4ch-nvr-system-1tb-hdd-with-4-wireless-day-night-ip-cameras/Very disappointed and I feel cheated by Zmodo company.Added feedback on Sept 19th, 2013:After getting some online support on July 17, the NVR was working well for about a month. Now it is failing and kept rebooting whenever I tried to change the web/video/phone port so I can view remotely. I emailed and called many times and they asked me to send back the NVR for repair. :-( After spending over $500 for this system, it worked reliably for only one month.PLEASE DON'T PURCHASE THIS OR ANY OTHER SYSTEM FROM ZMODO. YOU WILL REGRET.AVOID THIS SYSTEM: http://www.zmodo.com/wireless-network-nvr-ip-system-1tb.html

Reviews.Title: Do not Buy this system
Reviews.Author: AlanE
Reviews.Content: I received this system and buying it was mistake.Received it Thursday and took a half day off Friday from work to get it up running. Worked on it for 6 hrs. Didn't realize you need additional monitor and need to be hook up to router its not plug and play system like it says it is. It a nightmare I worked on Sunday from 11am to 6pm tried to get there tech support it was to be 24/7 not. I went to there web site to see if I doing something wrong. Called Monday tech support Half hour before I got someone. I Was with him on phone 1hr.Only got 2 Camera installed in software and not really working. Then he said to finish them my self.Had no clue how to finish Hooking them up to nvr. I ask the Tech to finish helping me he said he didn't have a enough time to help.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable
Reviews.Author: Gamal Halaka
Reviews.Content: constantly loosing signal between IP cameras and DVR, no night vesion, once it gets dark you will see a black screen no imadges even if you are standing right in front of the camera,tech support people are nice but they can not solve the problem,you have to be on hold for at least 2 hours to get a person from tech support.Save your money this system will not provid any reliable suvelance to your home or busines.

Reviews.Title: juck cameras
Reviews.Author: very unhappy customer
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time or money on these cameras.  They are the biggest piece of junk I've ever used.  costumer service is the worst, your on hold for hours not getting any help.  each different person tells you something different about what is wrong with the cameras.  they are guessing the whole time, and wasting your own valuable time.  i work for a large military contractor, and i am in the computer field and i cannot figure out what is wrong with these cameras.  save your money, do NOT buy these cameras.

Reviews.Title: No support
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Zmodo NVR recorder and wireless cameras. After many nights of frustration in trying to set the system up I tried to get help from the company. Their website claims they have 24/7 tech support = remote assistance, email support, customer phone call back support - all lies! I have tried all forms of their support systems - no response from the company from multiple emails, online support, phone call back, and their remote assistance (which tells you are connected and in a queue for assistance) is non existent. 14 hrs later and I was still in the queue.The system looks easy to set up. The instillation guide details how to set the system up but tells you nothing about what to do if one of the multiple steps do not work.Buy something else and save yourself the time and trouble you will get with this junk!

Reviews.Title: There is NO support for ZMODO products
Reviews.Author: Fredric E. Calev "Fredric E. Calev"
Reviews.Content: I have a ZMD-NV-SBN4 system with 4 cameras.NVR: Hardware V.1.0.01NVR: Software V.1.2.05Camera hardware V.1.0.01Camera software V.1.2.04I cannot get the motion capture to work with any cameras.I have tried Zmodo's chat sessions, but have never gotten through to a technician.I have tried calling Zmodo's support and have been placed on hold with no response in over 45 minutes.I have tried e-mailing Zmodo's support group with no responses whatsoever.Basically I have tried multiple times to contact Zmodo's support group.Zmodo HAS NO SUPPORT. You are on your own.I would recommend NOT purchasing any of their products based on NO product support from the company.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo NVR Firmware V.1.0.01
Reviews.Author: Johnny Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I had this for almost one year now and as of today, this NVR still can't sustain to keep the 4 wireless cameras alive.  Zmodo sent me replacement of all four wifi ip cameras, but after an hour or so, same results.  I have another real cheap camera that never gave me any trouble...constant operational state..... but I am very disappointed with this Zmodo NVR 4CH system.  Only thing left is to replace the NVR itself.

Reviews.Title: save the money
Reviews.Author: Joel Doublya
Reviews.Content: After a month the two of  the cameras which were outside no longer worked. The picture is ok but it is nearly impossible to view on a mobie device or external computer unless your a network engineer. The interface is clunky and hard to understand. I had high hopes for this setup but never got it to work as I anticipated.

Reviews.Title: IT MAN
Reviews.Author: John Marshall
Reviews.Content: have not gotten it up and running yet. still working on it. a little software would have been nice.I am looking for a IT Man to help me. Not as easy as they claim.
